SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: theory about Pluto's unusual orbit
how Pluto's orbit is unusual:
most planets have circular orbits
Pluto has elliptical (long and narrow) orbit
Pluto's orbit is usually outside Neptune's
Pluto's orbit is sometimes (every 248 years) inside Neptune's
theory about why Pluto's orbit is unusual:
Pluto is not planet
Pluto used to be one of Neptune's moons
Pluto used to be in orbit around Neptune
Pluto is now in irregular orbit around Sun
